$description: Vanilla Mantine dark theme color variants. Dark theme uses lighter shades (shade 4-5) for filled states to maintain visibility on dark backgrounds.

text.$description: Text color for dark elements (lighter for dark theme)

filled-hover.$description: Hover state for dark filled elements

light.$description: Light variant of dark color for dark theme

light-hover.$description: Hover state for dark light elements

light-color.$description: Text color for dark light elements

outline-hover.$description: Hover state for dark outline elements
